trans-unit.source: Resolve the request by returning a body plus additional HTTP information (such as response headers) if provided. If the request specifies an expected body type, the body is converted into the requested type. Otherwise, the body is converted to JSON by default.
trans-unit.target: 通过返回正文以及其他HTTP信息（例如响应标头）（如果提供）来解析请求。如果请求指定了预期的主体类型，则将主体转换为请求的类型。否则，主体默认情况下会转换为 JSON 。

trans-unit.source: Resolve the request by returning an ErrorEvent (e.g. simulating a network failure).
trans-unit.target: 通过返回 ErrorEvent （例如，模拟网络故障）来解决请求。

trans-unit.source: Routed NgModules
trans-unit.target: Routed NgModules

trans-unit.source: Routed NgModules rarely have providers because you load a routed NgModule only when needed (such as for routing). Services listed in the NgModules' provider array would not be available because the root injector wouldn’t know about the lazy-loaded NgModule. If you include providers, the lifetime of the provided services should be the same as the lifetime of the NgModule. Don't provide app-wide singleton services in a routed NgModule or in an NgModule that the routed NgModule imports.
trans-unit.target: 路由NgModule很少具有提供程序，因为仅在需要时（例如用于路由）才加载路由NgModule。NgModules的 provider 数组中列出的服务将不可用，因为根注入器不知道延迟加载的NgModule。如果包括提供程序，则提供的服务的生存期应与NgModule的生存期相同。不要在路由的NgModule或路由的NgModule导入的NgModule中提供应用程序范围内的单例服务。

trans-unit.source: Routed apps must fallback to index.html
trans-unit.target: 路由的应用必须回 index.html

trans-unit.source: Routed components
trans-unit.target: 绕线部件

trans-unit.source: Routed components are also entry components because they need to be loaded dynamically. The router creates them and drops them into the DOM near a <router-outlet>.
trans-unit.target: 路由组件也是入口组件，因为它们需要动态加载。路由器创建它们并将它们放入 <router-outlet> 附近的DOM中。

trans-unit.source: Routed feature modules are domain feature modules whose top components are the targets of router navigation routes.
trans-unit.target: 路由功能模块是域功能模块,其顶部组件是路由器导航路由的目标。

trans-unit.source: Routed feature modules don’t export anything because their components never appear in the template of an external component.
trans-unit.target: 路由功能模块不会导出任何内容，因为它们的组件永远不会出现在外部组件的模板中。

trans-unit.source: Routed feature modules rarely have providers for reasons explained in Lazy Loading Feature Modules. When they do, the lifetime of the provided services should be the same as the lifetime of the module. Don't provide application-wide singleton services in a routed feature module or in a module that the routed module imports.
trans-unit.target: 路由功能模块很少具有提供程序，这是由于延迟加载功能模块中所述的原因。当它们这样做时，所提供服务的生存期应与模块的生存期相同。不要在路由功能模块或路由模块导入的模块中提供应用程序范围内的单例服务。

trans-unit.source: Routing component
trans-unit.target: 路由组件

trans-unit.source: Routing enables users to navigate between different routes in an application. When a user navigates from one route to another, the Angular router maps the URL path to a relevant component and displays its view. Animating this route transition can greatly enhance the user experience.
trans-unit.target: 路由器使用户能够在应用程序中的不同路线之间进行导航。当用户从一个路由导航到另一个路由时,Angular 路由器会将 URL 路径映射到相关组件并显示其视图。对这种路由过渡进行动画处理,可以极大地提升用户体验。

trans-unit.source: Routing is handled differently in Angular.
trans-unit.target: Angular中的路由处理方式不同。

trans-unit.source: Routing is pretty complicated. Testing the DashboardComponent seemed daunting in part because it involves the Router, which it injects together with the HeroService.
trans-unit.target: 路由非常复杂。测试 DashboardComponent 似乎有些艰巨，因为它涉及到 Router ，它与 HeroService 一起注入。

trans-unit.source: Routing makes more sense when there are multiple views. So far there's only the heroes view.
trans-unit.target: 当有多个视图时,路由更合理。目前只有英雄视图。

trans-unit.target: 路由模块。

trans-unit.source: Routing to a named outlet has revealed a previously hidden router truth: you can target multiple outlets with multiple routes in the same RouterLink directive.
trans-unit.target: 路由到命名插座揭示了以前隐藏的路由器事实：您可以在同一 RouterLink 指令中将具有多个路由的多个插座作为目标。

trans-unit.source: Routing to a named outlet has revealed a router feature: you can target multiple outlets with multiple routes in the same RouterLink directive.
trans-unit.target: 路由到命名插座揭示了路​​由器功能：您可以在同一 RouterLink 指令中将具有多个路由的多个插座作为目标。

trans-unit.source: Rule of One
trans-unit.target: 一条规则

trans-unit.source: Rules are used in BUILD.bazel files, which are markers for the packages in your workspace. Each BUILD.bazel file declares a separate package to Bazel, though you can have more coarse-grained distributions so that the packages you publish (for example, to npm) can be made up of many Bazel packages.
trans-unit.target: 在 BUILD.bazel 文件中使用规则，这些文件是您工作区中软件包的标记。每个 BUILD.bazel 文件都向Bazel声明了一个单独的程序包，尽管您可以拥有更粗粒度的分发，以便您发布的程序包（例如，发布到 npm ）可以由许多Bazel程序包组成。

trans-unit.source: Rules can collect option values from the caller and inject them into templates. The options available to your rules, with their allowed values and defaults, are defined in the schematic's JSON schema file, <schematic>/schema.json. You can define variable or enumerated data types for the schema using TypeScript interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 规则可以从调用方收集选项值，并将它们注入模板中。规则可用的选项及其允许的值和默认值在逻辑示意图的JSON模式文件 <schematic>/schema.json 中定义。您可以使用TypeScript接口为架构定义变量或枚举数据类型。

trans-unit.source: Rules can make use of utilities provided with the @schematics/angular package. Look for helper functions for working with modules, dependencies, TypeScript, AST, JSON, Angular CLI workspaces and projects, and more.
trans-unit.target: 规则可以使用 @schematics/angular 软件包提供的实用程序。寻找用于处理模块，依赖项，TypeScript，AST，JSON，Angular CLI工作区和项目等的辅助函数。

trans-unit.source: Run build when files change.
trans-unit.target: 当文件改变时,运行构建。

trans-unit.source: Run change detection through the test fixture.

trans-unit.source: Run for 200ms, with no delay. Use a standard curve to start slow, accelerate in the middle, and then decelerate slowly at the end: '0.2s ease-in-out'

trans-unit.source: Schematic prompts introduce user interaction into schematic execution. You can configure schematic options to display a customizable question to the user. The prompts are displayed before the execution of the schematic, which then uses the response as the value for the option. This allows users to direct the operation of the schematic without requiring in-depth knowledge of the full spectrum of available options.
trans-unit.target: 原理图提示将用户交互引入到原理图执行中。您可以配置逻辑示意图选项，以向用户显示可自定义的问题。在执行原理图之前会显示提示，然后该原理图将响应用作选项的值。这使用户可以指导原理图的操作，而无需深入了解可用选项的全部范围。

trans-unit.source: Schematics are part of the Angular ecosystem. The Angular CLI uses schematics to apply transforms to a web-app project. You can modify these schematics, and define new ones to do things like update your code to fix breaking changes in a dependency, for example, or to add a new configuration option or framework to an existing project.
trans-unit.target: 原理图是Angular生态系统的一部分。该角CLI使用图表来变换应用到网络应用项目。您可以修改这些原理图，并定义新的原理图，以执行诸如更新代码以修复依赖项中的重大更改之类的事情，或者为现有项目添加新的配置选项或框架。

trans-unit.source: Schematics come with their own command-line tool. Using Node 6.9 or above, install the Schematics CLI globally:

trans-unit.source: Schematics that are included in the @schematics/angular collection are run by default by the commands ng generate and ng add. The package contains named schematics that configure the options that are available to the CLI for ng generate sub-commands, such as ng generate component and ng generate service. The subcommands for ng generate are shorthand for the corresponding schematic. You can specify a particular schematic (or collection of schematics) to generate, using the long form:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， @schematics/angular 集合中包含的原理图由 ng generate 和 ng add 命令运行。该软件包包含命名的示意图，这些示意图配置了CLI可以用于 ng generate 子命令的选项，例如 ng generate component 和 ng generate service 。 ng generate 的子命令是相应原理图的简写。您可以使用长格式指定要生成的特定原理图（或原理图集合）：

trans-unit.source: Scopes must be strictly nested and are analogous to stack frames, but do not have to follow the stack frames. Instead it is recommended that they follow logical nesting. You may want to use Event Signatures as they are defined in WTF.
trans-unit.target: 范围必须严格嵌套且类似于堆栈框架，但不必遵循堆栈框架。相反，建议它们遵循逻辑嵌套。您可能要使用在WTF中定义的事件签名。

trans-unit.source: Servers often return data in the form of a stream. Streams are useful because they make it easy to transform the returned data and make modifications to the way you request that data. The Angular HTTP client, HttpClient, is a built-in way to fetch data from external APIs and provide them to your app as a stream.
trans-unit.target: 服务器通常以流的形式返回数据。流之所以有用，是因为它们使转换返回的数据以及修改请求数据的方式变得容易。Angular HTTP客户端 HttpClient 是一种内置方法，可从外部API提取数据并将其作为流提供给您的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Service workers augment the traditional web deployment model and empower applications to deliver a user experience with the reliability and performance on par with natively-installed code. Adding a service worker to an Angular application is one of the steps for turning an application into a Progressive Web App (also known as a PWA).
trans-unit.target: 服务人员增强了传统的Web部署模型，并赋予应用程序以与本机安装的代码相同的可靠性和性能来交付用户体验。将服务工作者添加到Angular应用程序是将应用程序转换为渐进式Web应用程序（也称为PWA）的步骤之一。

trans-unit.source: Service workers function as a network proxy. They intercept all outgoing HTTP requests made by the application and can choose how to respond to them. For example, they can query a local cache and deliver a cached response if one is available. Proxying isn't limited to requests made through programmatic APIs, such as fetch; it also includes resources referenced in HTML and even the initial request to index.html. Service worker-based caching is thus completely programmable and doesn't rely on server-specified caching headers.
trans-unit.target: 服务人员充当网络代理。它们拦截应用程序发出的所有传出HTTP请求，并可以选择如何响应它们。例如，他们可以查询本地缓存，并在可用时传递缓存的响应。代理不限于通过编程API发出的请求，例如 fetch ；它还包括HTML引用的资源，甚至包括对 index.html 的初始请求。因此，基于Service Worker的缓存是完全可编程的，并且不依赖于服务器指定的缓存头。

trans-unit.target: Angular中的服务人员

trans-unit.source: Services
trans-unit.target: Services

trans-unit.source: Services and controllers can be turned into classes. That way they'll be a step closer to becoming Angular service and component classes, which will make life easier after the upgrade.
trans-unit.target: 服务和控制器可以变成类。这样，它们将更接近成为Angular服务和组件类，这将使升级后的生活更加轻松。

trans-unit.source: Services and dependency injection
trans-unit.target: 服务和依赖注入

trans-unit.source: Services are a great way to share information among classes that don't know each other. You'll create a MessageService and inject it in two places.
trans-unit.target: 服务是在彼此不认识的类之间共享信息的好方法。您将创建一个 MessageService 并将其注入两个位置。

trans-unit.source: Services are a great way to share information among classes that don't know each other. You'll create a MessageService and inject it in two places:
trans-unit.target: 服务是在彼此不认识的类之间共享信息的好方法。您将创建一个 MessageService 并将其注入两个位置：

trans-unit.source: Services are an integral part of Angular applications. In Angular, a service is an instance of a class that can be made available to any part of your application using Angular's dependency injection system.
trans-unit.target: 服务是Angular应用程序不可或缺的一部分。在Angular中，服务是类的实例，可以使用Angular的依赖项注入系统将其提供给应用程序的任何部分。

trans-unit.source: Services are an integral part of Angular applications. In Angular, a service is an instance of a class that you can make available to any part of your application using Angular's dependency injection system.
trans-unit.target: 服务是Angular应用程序不可或缺的一部分。在Angular中，服务是类的实例，您可以使用Angular的依赖项注入系统将其提供给应用程序的任何部分。

trans-unit.source: Services are often the easiest files to unit test. Here are some synchronous and asynchronous unit tests of the ValueService written without assistance from Angular testing utilities.
trans-unit.target: 服务通常是最容易进行单元测试的文件。这是在没有Angular测试实用程序帮助的情况下编写的一些 ValueService 同步和异步单元测试。

trans-unit.source: Services are singletons
trans-unit.target: 服务是单子

trans-unit.source: Services are singletons within the scope of an injector. That is, there is at most one instance of a service in a given injector.
trans-unit.target: 服务是注入器范围内的单例。即，在给定的喷射器中最多有一种服务实例。

trans-unit.source: Services are the place where you share data between parts of your application. For the online store, the cart service is where you store your cart data and methods.
trans-unit.target: 服务是您在应用程序的各个部分之间共享数据的地方。对于在线商店来说,购物车服务是您存储购物车数据和方法的地方。

trans-unit.source: Services can be used to share data across components:
trans-unit.target: 服务可以用来在各个组件之间共享数据。

trans-unit.source: Services can depend on other services. For example, here's a HeroService that depends on the Logger service, and also uses BackendService to get heroes. That service in turn might depend on the HttpClient service to fetch heroes asynchronously from a server.
trans-unit.target: 服务可以依赖于其他服务。例如，这里有一个 HeroService ，它依赖于 Logger 服务，并且还使用 BackendService 来获取英雄。该服务反过来可能依赖 HttpClient 服务从服务器异步获取英雄。

trans-unit.source: Services can have their own dependencies. HeroService is very simple and doesn't have any dependencies of its own. Suppose, however, that you want it to report its activities through a logging service. You can apply the same constructor injection pattern, adding a constructor that takes a Logger parameter.
trans-unit.target: 服务可以具有自己的依赖性。 HeroService 非常简单，没有任何依赖关系。但是，假设您希望它通过日志记录服务报告其活动。您可以应用相同的构造函数注入模式，添加带有 Logger 参数的构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Services often depend on other services that Angular injects into the constructor. In many cases, it's easy to create and inject these dependencies by hand while calling the service's constructor.
trans-unit.target: 服务通常取决于Angular注入到构造函数中的其他服务。在许多情况下，在调用服务的构造函数时，手动创建和注入这些依赖关系很容易。

trans-unit.source: Services should declare their own providers (rather than declaring providers in the NgModule or a component), so that they are tree-shakable. This allows the compiler to leave the service out of the bundle if it never gets injected into the application that imports the library. For more about this, see Tree-shakable providers.
trans-unit.target: 服务应声明自己的提供程序（而不是在NgModule或组件中声明提供程序），以便它们可被树状摇动。如果从不将服务注入到导入该库的应用程序中，这将使编译器将服务从捆绑中排除。有关此的更多信息，请参见可摇树的提供程序。

trans-unit.source: Sets up a new channel on the MessageBus. MUST be called before calling from or to on the channel. If runInZone is true then the source will emit events inside the angular zone and the sink will buffer messages and send only once the zone exits. if runInZone is false then the source will emit events inside the global zone and the sink will send messages immediately.
trans-unit.target: 在MessageBus上设置一个新通道。必须在通道上调用from或to之前被调用。如果runInZone为true,那么源将在角区内发出事件,而汇将缓冲消息,并且只在角区退出后才发送。如果runInZone为false,那么源将在全局区内发出事件,而汇将立即发送消息。

trans-unit.source: Sets up a new channel on the MessageBusSink. MUST be called before calling to on the channel. If runInZone is true the sink will buffer messages and send only once the zone exits. if runInZone is false the sink will send messages immediately.
trans-unit.target: 在MessageBusSink上设置一个新通道。在调用通道之前必须调用。如果 runInZone 为真,则水槽将缓冲消息,并仅在区间退出后发送消息。

trans-unit.source: Sets up a new channel on the MessageBusSource. MUST be called before calling from on the channel. If runInZone is true then the source will emit events inside the angular zone. if runInZone is false then the source will emit events inside the global zone.
trans-unit.target: 在MessageBusSource上设置一个新通道。在从通道上调用之前,必须先调用该函数。如果runInZone为true,则消息源将在角区域内发射事件。如果runInZone为false,则消息源将在全局区域内发射事件。

trans-unit.source: Since TypeScript is a superset of ECMAScript 2015, which in turn is a superset of ECMAScript 5, "switching" to TypeScript doesn't necessarily require anything more than installing the TypeScript compiler and renaming files from *.js to *.ts. trans-unit.source: So far, we've learned simple animations of single HTML elements. Angular also lets you animate coordinated sequences, such as an entire grid or list of elements as they enter and leave a page. You can choose to run multiple animations in parallel, or run discrete animations sequentially, one following another.
trans-unit.target: 到目前为止,我们已经学会了单个HTML元素的简单动画。Angular还可以让您对协调的序列进行动画处理,例如整个网格或元素列表进入和离开页面时的动画。您可以选择并行运行多个动画,或者依次运行离散的动画,一个接着一个。

trans-unit.source: So instead, you'll update the empty path route in app-routing.module.ts to redirect to /superheroes.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您将在 app-routing.module.ts 中更新空路径路由以重定向到 /superheroes 。

trans-unit.source: So normally a hybrid application begins life as an AngularJS application, and it is AngularJS that processes the root template, e.g. the index.html. Angular then steps into the picture when an Angular component is used somewhere in an AngularJS template. That component's template will then be managed by Angular, and it may contain any number of Angular components and directives.
trans-unit.target: 所以,通常一个混合应用一开始是以AngularJS应用的形式出现的,处理根模板的是AngularJS,比如index.html。然后,当AngularJS模板中的某个地方使用了一个Angular组件时,Angular就会介入其中。该组件的模板就会被Angular管理,它可能包含任何数量的Angular组件和指令。

trans-unit.source: So, you can write an Angular component and then use it from AngularJS code. This is useful when you start to migrate from lower-level components and work your way up. But in some cases it is more convenient to do things in the opposite order: To start with higher-level components and work your way down. This too can be done using the upgrade/static. You can upgrade AngularJS component directives and then use them from Angular.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您可以编写一个Angular组件，然后从AngularJS代码中使用它。当您开始从较低级别的组件进行迁移并逐步升级时，这很有用。但是在某些情况下，以相反的顺序执行操作会更方便：从更高级别的组件开始并逐步解决。这也可以使用 upgrade/static 来完成。你可以升级 AngularJS组件指令，然后在Angular中使用它们。

trans-unit.source: Solution
trans-unit.target: Solution

trans-unit.source: Some Angular libraries, such as @angular/router and @ngrx/store, implement APIs that return a type called ModuleWithProviders (typically via a method named forRoot()). This type represents an NgModule along with additional providers. Angular version 9 deprecates use of ModuleWithProviders without an explicitly generic type, where the generic type refers to the type of the NgModule. In a future version of Angular, the generic will no longer be optional.
trans-unit.target: 一些Angular库（例如 @angular/router 和 @ngrx/store ）实现了API，这些API返回称为 ModuleWithProviders 的类型（通常通过名为 forRoot() 的方法）。此类型表示 NgModule 以及其他提供程序。 Angular版本9不建议使用不带显式泛型类型的 ModuleWithProviders ，泛型类型是指 NgModule 的类型。在Angular的未来版本中，泛型将不再是可选的。

trans-unit.source: Some DOM properties don't have corresponding attributes; for example, textContent.

trans-unit.target: 某些HTML属性没有相应的属性。例如， aria-* 。

trans-unit.source: Some NgModules and their services should be loaded only once by the root AppModule. Importing the module a second time by lazy loading a module could produce errant behavior that may be difficult to detect and diagnose.

trans-unit.source: Some additional options can only be set through the configuration file, either by direct editing or with the ng config command. These include assets, styles, and scripts objects that provide runtime-global resources to include in the project. Resources in CSS, such as images and fonts, are automatically written and fingerprinted at the root of the output folder.
trans-unit.target: 某些其他选项只能通过配置文件设置，可以通过直接编辑或使用 ng config 命令进行设置。其中包括 assets ， styles 和 scripts 对象，这些对象提供了运行时全局资源以包含在项目中。CSS中的资源（例如图像和字体）会自动写入输出文件夹的根目录并用指纹进行指纹识别。

trans-unit.source: Some additional options can only be set through the configuration file, either by direct editing or with the ng config command. These include assets, styles, and scripts objects that provide runtime-global resources to include in the project. Resources in CSS, such as images and fonts, are automatically written and fingerprinted at the root of the output folder.

trans-unit.source: Some applications will be easier to upgrade than others, and there are many ways to make it easier for yourself. It is possible to prepare and align AngularJS applications with Angular even before beginning the upgrade process. These preparation steps are all about making the code more decoupled, more maintainable, and better aligned with modern development tools. That means in addition to making the upgrade easier, you will also improve the existing AngularJS applications.
trans-unit.target: 有些应用程序会比其他应用程序更容易升级,有很多方法可以让自己更容易升级。甚至在开始升级过程之前,就可以准备好AngularJS应用并与Angular保持一致。这些准备步骤都是为了让代码更加解耦,更加可维护,更好地与现代开发工具保持一致。这意味着除了让升级变得更容易,你还会改善现有的AngularJS应用。

trans-unit.source: Some devices don't support JavaScript or execute JavaScript so poorly that the user experience is unacceptable. For these cases, you may require a server-rendered, no-JavaScript version of the app. This version, however limited, may be the only practical alternative for people who otherwise couldn't use the app at all.
trans-unit.target: 有些设备不支持 JavaScript,或者执行 JavaScript 的能力太差,以至于用户体验无法接受。对于这些情况,您可能需要一个服务器渲染的、无JavaScript版本的应用程序。这个版本,无论多么有限,对于那些否则根本无法使用应用程序的人来说,可能是唯一实用的选择。

trans-unit.source: Some environments or platforms, like @angular/platform-server used in Server-side Rendering, don't support Web Workers. You have to provide a fallback mechanism to perform the computations that the worker would perform to ensure your application will work in these environments.
trans-unit.target: 某些环境或平台（例如 @angular/platform-server 端渲染中使用的@ angular / platform-server）不支持Web Workers。您必须提供一个后备机制来执行工作程序将要执行的计算，以确保您的应用程序将在这些环境中运行。

trans-unit.source: Some environments or platforms, such as @angular/platform-server used in Server-side Rendering, don't support web workers. To ensure that your application will work in these environments, you must provide a fallback mechanism to perform the computations that the worker would otherwise perform.
trans-unit.target: 某些环境或平台（例如，服务器端渲染中使用的 @angular/platform-server 不支持Web worker。为了确保您的应用程序可以在这些环境中运行，您必须提供一个后备机制来执行工作程序本应执行的计算。

trans-unit.source: Some features of Angular may require additional polyfills.
trans-unit.target: Angular的某些功能可能需要额外的polyfills。

trans-unit.source: Some legacy browsers still download both bundles, but only execute the appropriate scripts based on the attributes mentioned above. You can read more on the issue here.

trans-unit.source: Some legal HTML doesn't make much sense in a template. The <html>, <body>, and <base> elements have no useful role. Pretty much everything else is fair game.
trans-unit.target: 某些合法的HTML在模板中没有多大意义。的 <html> ， <body> ，和 <base> 元素没有有益的作用。几乎所有其他一切都是公平的游戏。

trans-unit.source: Some modules, like AppModule, must be loaded from the start. But others can and should be lazy loaded. The AdminModule, for example, is needed by a few authorized users, so you should only load it when requested by the right people.
trans-unit.target: 某些模块（例如 AppModule ）必须从头开始加载。但是其他人可以并且应该懒加载。该 AdminModule ，例如，由少数授权用户需要的，所以你应该只有当权利人请求加载它。

trans-unit.source: Some pipes require at least one parameter and allow more optional parameters, such as SlicePipe. For example, {{ slice:1:5 }} creates a new array or string containing a subset of the elements starting with element 1 and ending with element 5.
trans-unit.target: 一些管道需要至少一个参数，并允许更多可选参数，例如 SlicePipe 。例如， {{ slice:1:5 }} 创建一个新的数组或字符串，其中包含从元素 1 开始到元素 5 结束的元素的子集。

trans-unit.source: Someday you'll want to repeat a block of HTML but only when a particular condition is true. You'll try to put both an *ngFor and an *ngIf on the same host element. Angular won't let you. You may apply only one structural directive to an element.
trans-unit.target: 总有一天，您只想在满足特定条件的情况下才重复HTML块。您将尝试将 *ngFor 和 *ngIf 放在同一宿主元素上。Angular不会让你。您只能将一个结构指令应用于元素。

trans-unit.source: Something could go wrong on the client-side such as a network error that prevents the request from completing successfully or an exception thrown in an RxJS operator. These errors produce JavaScript ErrorEvent objects.
trans-unit.target: 客户端可能出了点问题，例如导致请求无法成功完成的网络错误或RxJS运算符中引发的异常。这些错误会产生JavaScript ErrorEvent 对象。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes "breaking changes", such as the removal of support for select APIs and features, are necessary to innovate and stay current with new best practices, changing dependencies, or changes in the (web) platform itself.
trans-unit.target: 有时,"突破性的变化",如取消对特定API和功能的支持,对于创新和保持与新的最佳实践、不断变化的依赖性或(网络)平台本身的变化是必要的。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes a binding expression triggers a type error during AOT compilation and it is not possible or difficult to fully specify the type. To silence the error, you can use the $any() cast function to cast the expression to the any type as in the following example:

Sometimes a service depends on other services, which may depend on yet other services. The dependency injection framework resolves these nested dependencies in the correct order. At each step, the consumer of dependencies declares what it requires in its constructor, and lets the framework provide them.
trans-unit.target: 有时,一个服务依赖于其他服务,而这些服务又可能依赖于其他服务。依赖注入框架以正确的顺序解析这些嵌套的依赖关系。在每个步骤中,依赖的消费者在其构造函数中声明它所需要的东西,并让框架提供它们。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes an app needs to display a view or a portion of a view only under specific circumstances.
trans-unit.target: 有时,一个应用程序只需要在特定的情况下显示一个视图或视图的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes applications genuinely need to include executable code, display an <iframe> from some URL, or construct potentially dangerous URLs. To prevent automatic sanitization in any of these situations, you can tell Angular that you inspected a value, checked how it was generated, and made sure it will always be secure. But be careful. If you trust a value that might be malicious, you are introducing a security vulnerability into your application. If in doubt, find a professional security reviewer.
trans-unit.target: 有时，应用程序确实需要包括可执行代码，显示某些URL 的 <iframe> 或构造潜在危险的URL。为了防止在任何情况下进行自动清理，您可以告诉Angular您检查了一个值，检查了它的产生方式，并确保它始终是安全的。但是要小心。如果您信任一个可能是恶意的值，那么您正在向应用程序中引入一个安全漏洞。如有疑问，请找专业的安全审查员。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes applications transfer large amounts of data and those transfers can take a long time. File uploads are a typical example. Give the users a better experience by providing feedback on the progress of such transfers.
trans-unit.target: 有时,应用程序传输大量数据,这些传输可能需要很长时间。文件上传就是一个典型的例子。通过对这种传输的进度提供反馈,给用户更好的体验。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes applications transfer large amounts of data and those transfers can take a long time. File uploads are a typical example. You can give the users a better experience by providing feedback on the progress of such transfers.
trans-unit.target: 有时,应用程序传输大量数据,这些传输可能需要很长时间。文件上传就是一个典型的例子。你可以通过对这种传输的进度提供反馈,给用户更好的体验。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes however, null values in the property path may be OK under certain circumstances, especially when the value starts out null but the data arrives eventually.
trans-unit.target: 但是，有时在某些情况下，属性路径中的 null 值可能是可以的，尤其是当该值以空值开始但最终到达数据时。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes it's easier to provide a ready-made object rather than ask the injector to create it from a class. To inject an object you have already created, configure the injector with the useValue option
trans-unit.target: 有时提供一个现成的对象比要求注入器从类创建它更容易。要注入已创建的对象，请使用 useValue 选项配置注入器

trans-unit.source: Sometimes it's easier to provide a ready-made object rather than ask the injector to create it from a class. To inject an object you have already created, configure the injector with the useValue option
trans-unit.target: 有时提供一个现成的对象比要求注入器从类创建它更容易。要注入已创建的对象，请使用 useValue 选项配置注入器

trans-unit.source: Sometimes it's useful to apply styles based on some condition outside of a component's view. For example, a CSS theme class could be applied to the document <body> element, and you want to change how your component looks based on that.
trans-unit.target: 有时根据组件视图外部的某些条件应用样式很有用。例如，可以将CSS主题类应用于文档 <body> 元素，并且您希望基于此元素更改组件的外观。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes refers to a dependency-injection binding between a token and a dependency provider.
trans-unit.target: 有时是指令牌和依赖项提供程序之间的依赖项注入绑定。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes the error is transient and goes away automatically if you try again. For example, network interruptions are common in mobile scenarios, and trying again can produce a successful result.
trans-unit.target: 有时错误是短暂的,再试一次就会自动消失。例如,网络中断在移动场景中很常见,再次尝试可以产生成功的结果。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes the error is transient and will go away automatically if you try again. For example, network interruptions are common in mobile scenarios, and trying again may produce a successful result.
trans-unit.target: 有时,错误是短暂的,如果你再次尝试,错误会自动消失。例如,网络中断在移动场景中很常见,再次尝试可能会产生成功的结果。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes the public name of an input/output property should be different from the internal name. While it is a best practice to avoid this situation, Angular does offer a solution.
trans-unit.target: 有时,一个输入/输出属性的公共名称应该与内部名称不同。虽然避免这种情况是最好的做法,但Angular确实提供了一种解决方案。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes the section header text makes for an unattractive anchor. This one is pretty bad.
trans-unit.target: 有时，节标题文本会使锚变得不那么吸引人。这是非常糟糕的。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes there are differences between the name of property and an attribute.
trans-unit.target: 有时,属性名称和属性之间存在差异。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes using the appropriate native element requires a container element. For example, the native <input> element cannot have children, so any custom text entry components need to wrap an <input> with additional elements. While you might just include the <input> in your custom component's template, this makes it impossible for users of the component to set arbitrary properties and attributes to the input element. Instead, you can create a container component that uses content projection to include the native control in the component's API.
trans-unit.target: 有时使用适当的本机元素需要一个容器元素。例如，本机 <input> 元素不能有子元素，因此任何自定义文本输入组件都需要用其他元素包装 <input> 。尽管您可能只在自定义组件的模板中包含 <input> ，但这使该组件的用户无法为input元素设置任意属性和属性。相反，您可以创建一个使用内容投影的容器组件，以将本机控件包含在组件的API中。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes you don't know the value of a dimensional style property until runtime. For example, elements often have widths and heights that depend on their content and the screen size. These properties are often challenging to animate using CSS.
trans-unit.target: 有时,你直到运行时才知道一个维度样式属性的值。例如,元素的宽度和高度通常取决于其内容和屏幕大小。这些属性在使用CSS进行动画制作时往往具有挑战性。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes you need to clear the request body rather than replace it. If you set the cloned request body to undefined, Angular assumes you intend to leave the body as is. That is not what you want. If you set the cloned request body to null, Angular knows you intend to clear the request body.
trans-unit.target: 有时您需要清除请求正文而不是替换它。如果将克隆的请求正文设置为 undefined ，Angular会假定您打算保留该正​​文。那不是你想要的。如果将克隆的请求正文设置为 null ，则Angular知道您打算清除请求正文。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes you need to clear the request body rather than replace it. To do this, set the cloned request body to null.
trans-unit.target: 有时您需要清除请求正文而不是替换它。为此，请将克隆的请求正文设置为 null 。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes you need to create a dependent value dynamically, based on information you won't have until run time. For example, you might need information that changes repeatedly in the course of the browser session. Also, your injectable service might not have independent access to the source of the information.
trans-unit.target: 有时,您需要根据在运行前不会得到的信息动态地创建一个依赖值。例如,您可能需要在浏览器会话过程中反复变化的信息。此外,您的可注入服务可能无法独立访问信息的来源。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes you want multiple instances of a service at the same level of the component hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 有时，您需要在组件层次结构的相同级别上使用服务的多个实例。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes you want to display an example of bad code or bad design.
trans-unit.target: 有时你想展示一个糟糕的代码或糟糕的设计的例子。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, a feature of your application requires accessing a part of a route, such as a query parameter or a fragment. The Tour of Heroes app at this stage in the tutorial uses a list view in which you can click on a hero to see details. The router uses an id to show the correct hero's details.
trans-unit.target: 有时，应用程序的功能需要访问路由的一部分，例如查询参数或片段。在教程的此阶段，“英雄之旅”应用程序使用列表视图，您可以在其中单击英雄以查看详细信息。路由器使用 id 显示正确的英雄详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, instead of starting an independent execution for each subscriber, you want each subscription to get the same values—even if values have already started emitting. This might be the case with something like an observable of clicks on the document object.
trans-unit.target: 有时，您希望每个订阅都获得相同的值，而不是为每个订阅者启动独立的执行，即使值已经开始发出。类似于可观察到的文档对象点击情况就是这种情况。

trans-unit.source: Soon you can load Angular dependencies into the application via index.html, but first you need to do some directory path adjustments. You'll need to load files from node_modules and the project root instead of from the /app directory as you've been doing to this point.
trans-unit.target: 很快，您可以通过 index.html 将Angular依赖项加载到应用程序中，但是首先您需要进行一些目录路径调整。您需要从 node_modules 和项目根目录而不是从 /app 目录中加载文件，直到现在为止。

trans-unit.source: Special injection tokens (such as TemplateRef or ViewContainerRef) return a new instance whenever they are requested (previously, instances of special tokens were shared if requested on the same node). This primarily affects tests that do identity comparison of these objects.

trans-unit.source: Specifying the response type is a declaration to TypeScript that it should expect your response to be of the given type. This is a build-time check and doesn't guarantee that the server will actually respond with an object of this type. It is up to the server to ensure that the type specified by the server API is returned.
trans-unit.target: 指定响应类型是对TypeScript的一个声明,它应该期望你的响应是给定的类型。这是一个构建时的检查,并不保证服务器将实际响应这个类型的对象。它是由服务器来确保服务器API指定的类型被返回。
